es.title: Sobre mí
es.summary: +10 años de experiencia como Desarrollador Web freelancer. Programador full stack particularmente enfocado en desarrollo de backend con PHP (CodeIgniter, Laravel) y frontend (jQuery, Svelte y React, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, Tailwindcss).

en.title: About me
en.summary: +10 years of experience as freelancer web developer. Full stack programmer particularly in backend development with PHP (CodeIgniter, Laravel) y frontend (jQuery, Svelte y React, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, Tailwindcss).
